info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 6:08PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LOCALIZED HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS... HAZARDS...A band of embedded heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 604 PM EST, a band of heavy snow showers was near Broadalbin, or 10 miles north of Amsterdam moving east at 40 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL BE NEAR... Galway around 615 PM EST. Rock City Falls around 620 PM EST. Milton, Ballston Spa, North Ballston Spa and Burnt Hills around 625 PM EST. Saratoga Springs, Round Lake and Country Knolls around 630 PM EST. Mechanicville around 640 PM EST. Hoosick Falls around 700 PM EST. Snowfall accumulations of a dusting to a quarter inch may occur in a few locations. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 10 and 15. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
